body.name: Sharp 1.1-Cu. Ft. Countertop Microwave Oven, White (Smc1161hw)
body.stockDetail: Only 3 left in stock - order soon.
features: 1.1 cu. ft., 1000 Watt, microwave oven. Enable silent mode to turn keypad and end of cooking reminder sound off. 12.4 in. Carousel turntable for even cooking.

Convenient +30 key for instant start and adding time. Stylish gray interior. WARNING: California Proposition 65 Warning. This product can expose you to chemicals including lead, which are known to the State of California to cause cancer and birth defects or other reproductive harm. For more information go to www.P65Warnings.ca.govSafety Data Sheet.
Easy-to-use preset buttons for popular foods and beverage. Express cook for single touch cooking for up to 6 minutes.
Auto defrost for quick and accurate thawing. Premium white LED display is easy to read.
body.description: The Sharp mid-Size, 1.1 cu. ft., 1000 Watt microwave oven in black takes up less space on your countertop and is our smallest oven for a full-size dinner plate. The SMC1161HW is packed with thoughtful and innovative features.- 1.1 cu. ft., 1000 Watt, microwave oven.- Convenient +30 key for instant start and adding time.- Easy-to-use preset buttons for popular foods and beverage.- Auto defrost for quick and accurate thawing.- Enable silent mode to turn keypad and end of cooking reminder sound off.- Stylish gray interior.- Express cook for single touch cooking for up to 6 minutes.- Premium white LED display is easy to read.- 12.4 in. Carousel turntable for even cooking.- WARNING: California Proposition 65 Warning. This product can expose you to chemicals including lead, which are known to the State of California to cause cancer and birth defects or other reproductive harm. For more information go to www.P65Warnings.ca.govSafety Data Sheet- Sold as 1 Each.The Sharp mid-Size, 1.1 cu. ft., 1000 Watt microwave oven in black takes up less space on your countertop and is our smallest oven for a full-size dinner plate. The SMC1161HW is packed with thoughtful and innovative features. Convenient preset buttons make cooking and reheating favorite foods and beverages a breeze. Express Cook offers One-Touch cooking for up to six minutes. The +30 key can be used for an instant start and to add time during cooking. Easy-to-clean black finish with stylish gray interior, and LED light complement your style. The 12.4 in., dishwasher-safe glass plate of the Carousel turntable system makes cleanup easy. The white LED display is bright and easy-to-read. Now that is Simply Better Living. With decades of experience designing innovative cooking appliances, it's easy to see why home cooks throughout the world trust Sharp Carousel.
